reviewText:
Buy this tape.  Even if you don't have a VHS player, buy it and have it converted to DVD or whatever technology you currently have.

Growing up in Michigan & visiting the dunes as a child I know the story of the sleeping bear well, but when our local PBS station aired this some years ago I was enthralled.  Jeff Daniels' calm reading of this nicely told story is soothing and adds to its poignancy.  The story book is a nice read but Daniels makes it magic.

PS if no longer available online you may be able to find this in bookstores in & around Northwestern Michigan especially in the Traverse City area.
